name: @freecodecamp/demo-projects
description: Example projects for the freeCodeCamp.org curriculum

scripts.test:personal-library: cd personal-library && cp sample.env .env && npm run test
scripts.test:stock-price-checker: cd stock-price-checker && cp sample.env .env && npm run test
